record.description: Age is no barrier and physical fitness is major aim. Anyone from 16 to 48, with two years of high school education, can enroll in the course. Here, as yet uninstructed in the correct way to stand at shoulder arms, Lewis Johnson, a university sophomore, and Paul Capak, field house attendant, fat, 40 and willing, represent the wide extremes of eligibility for the course.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Attached news clipping, fuzzy material on back, paint on surface.
